1388240.name: Savage Steel
1388240.description:
This is a game about barbarians! The measure of a true warrior is how well you can wield a weapon with your bare hands! There is no magic here, only sharpened blades and blunt weapons! HURGH!

Tongue in cheek 90’s game features include:
  • 4 player cooperative play! (No multi-tap required!)
  • Cutting edge 3D Mode 7 effects!
  • Large colourful player and enemy sprites!
  • 8 different lands to traverse!
  • Blast processing! (Actually this game is super optimised and you should be able to run it on a potatoe)

This is a co-operative adventure for 1 to 4 players, in the style of the 90's 16bit multiplayer titles, but with 4 players and the tight and responsive controls you expect from a modern game.

The combat is simple yet deep - it's responsive, addictive to learn, and you will have fun button mashing your way through the beginning and then, as the difficulty increases throughout the game and you are continually defeated, you will enjoy mastering the advanced techniques.



Check out the sidebar links to stay updated. The Discord website (via the newsletter signup) and the Steam discussions page, are all great ways to get updates and ask questions.
